info.description: Create/Update/View Funds Transfer between Customer Accounts
info.title: Account Transfer

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: This is the account which will be credited for the instruction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

transactionType.description: This is the type of transaction for which Beneficiary is created i.e. within bank account transfer or other bank transfer etc.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment

debitCurrency.description: Indicates the currency of debit account

debitAmount.description: The amount to be debited in a payment transaction

debitValueDate.description: The date on which the Invocation amount will be debited for settlement

creditAccountId.description: This is the account which will be credited for the instruction

creditCurrencyId.description: The currency of the credit side in payment transaction.

creditAmount.description: The amount to be credited in a payment transaction

creditValueDate.description: The value date applied to the credit side of a payment

commissionCode.description: These field control the allocation of Periodic commission �where the�field COMM.CODE is the trigger for periodic commission and the field CSN.CODE is a system maintained field and hold the commission amount relating to the period band

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
